column4: I'm trying to install a package in dapper, but it fails with "nxclient depends on libstdc++2.10-glibc2.2".... any ideas how I can go about finding "libstdc++2.10-glibc2.2"?
I just installed that package yesterday for nxclient using dpkg -i ... googled for the debian package
so did you have to manually download a *.deb file containing the missing dependency?  Or did it turn out to be a package already in the Ubuntu repos?
